title: 1241 Virginia Ave.  C3. 1 bed 1 bath
posting_body: You won't believe the size of this Historic Beauty!
Large 1BR, Top Floor ~ VaHi They don't make 'em like this any more!
Relax on your large front porch and let the rush of the day melt away!
This apartment home offers 12ft ceilings, hardwood floors, dishwasher, and central heat & air.
Residents enjoy off-street parking and community laundry.
Historic building located in Virginia Highlands proper, snuggled between Druid Hills and Midtown Atlanta.
Locals enjoy a charming, walk-able neighborhood with historic bungalows, unique shops, trendy restaurants and vibrant night life.
Easy access to Atlanta attractions such as the Botanical Gardens, Freedom Park and the Fernbank Museum.
Application fee - $75 Application approval based on strict credit check, rental history and background check.
Pets -Dogs allowed $300 fee (max.1) | Cats allowed $100 fee (max.2)
